name: best-random
description: A replacement for Math.random() that is tiny, fast, seedable, and has good statistical properties.

scripts.bench: npm run build && cd bench && ts-node index.ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: git reset --hard head && git clean -xfd && npm i && npm run build && npm t
scripts.postinstall: cd bench && npm install && cd .. && npm run make:practrand:install && npm run make:testu01:install
scripts.test:u32: npm run build && cd tools && ts-node binout.ts best-random uint32 0 | PractRand/RNG_test stdin32 -seed 0 -tf 2 -te 1 -multithreaded
scripts.test:u53: npm run build && cd tools && ts-node binout.ts best-random uint53 0 | PractRand/RNG_test stdin -seed 0 -tf 2 -te 1 -multithreaded
scripts.test:u53l: npm run build && cd tools && ts-node binout.ts best-random uint53lo 0 | PractRand/RNG_test stdin32 -seed 0 -tf 2 -te 1 -multithreaded
scripts.make:rng: npm run make:rng:rng && npm run make:testu01:rng && npm run make:practrand:rng
scripts.make:practrand:install: cd tools/PractRand && make clean fetchSrc base
scripts.make:testu01:install: cd tools/TestU01 && make clean fetchSrc base
scripts.waitforkey: echo "Press [Enter] key to exit..." && read unused > /dev/null
scripts.screen:smallcrush: npm run make:rng && npm run practrand:u64:core && npm run smallcrush:loop:core
scripts.screen:crush: npm run make:rng && npm run practrand:u64:core && npm run crush:loop:core
scripts.screen:bigcrush: npm run make:rng && npm run practrand:u64:core && npm run bigcrush:loop:core
scripts.practrand: npm run make:practrand:rng && npm run practrand:u64
scripts.practrand:u64:core: tmux new-session -s screen -d 'npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 33 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u64 2>&1 | tee u64.log"; npm run waitforkey'
scripts.cycle: cd tools/cycle && tmux new-session 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 0"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 50 -v 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 4"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 75 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 5"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 66 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 6"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 7"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 75 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 1"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 66 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 2"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 3"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.smallcrush:loop:core: tmux respawn-pane -t 0 -k 'sh -c "npm run --silent smallcrush:u32h -- -x 25"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run --silent smallcrush:u32l -- -x 25"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -v -p 50 'sh -c "npm run --silent smallcrush:u32lr -- -x 25"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -v -p 50 'sh -c "npm run --silent smallcrush:u32hr -- -x 25"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.crush:loop:core: tmux respawn-pane -t 0 -k 'sh -c "npm run --silent smallcrush:u32h -- -x 5 && npm run --silent crush:u32h -- -x 25 2>&1 | tee u32h.log"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run --silent smallcrush:u32l -- -x 5 && npm run --silent crush:u32l -- -x 25 2>&1 | tee u32l.log"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -v -p 50 'sh -c "npm run --silent smallcrush:u32lr -- -x 5 && npm run --silent crush:u32lr -- -x 25 2>&1 | tee u32lr.log"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -v -p 50 'sh -c "npm run --silent smallcrush:u32hr -- -x 5 && npm run --silent crush:u32hr -- -x 25 2>&1 | tee u32hr.log"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.bigcrush:loop:core: tmux respawn-pane -t 0 -k 'sh -c "npm run --silent smallcrush:u32h -- -x 5 && npm run --silent bigcrush:u32h -- -x 0 2>&1 | tee u32h.log"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run --silent smallcrush:u32l -- -x 5 && npm run --silent bigcrush:u32l -- -x 0 2>&1 | tee u32l.log"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -v -p 50 'sh -c "npm run --silent smallcrush:u32lr -- -x 5 && npm run --silent bigcrush:u32lr -- -x 0 2>&1 | tee u32lr.log"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -v -p 50 'sh -c "npm run --silent smallcrush:u32hr -- -x 5 && npm run --silent bigcrush:u32hr -- -x 0 2>&1 | tee u32hr.log"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.smallcrush:pcg: npm run make:rng:pcg && tmux new-session -s screen -d 'npm run waitforkey' && npm run smallcrush:loop:core
scripts.crush:pcg: npm run make:rng:pcg && tmux new-session -s screen -d 'npm run waitforkey' && npm run crush:loop:core
scripts.crush: npm run make:testu01:rng && tmux new-session -s screen -d 'npm run waitforkey' && npm run crush:loop:core
scripts.smallcrush: npm run make:testu01:rng && tmux new-session -s screen -d 'npm run waitforkey' && npm run smallcrush:loop:core

author: Daniel Lehenbauer
